articles.title: US Open champions to get $2.6 million, total compensation for tennis major hits $60M
articles.description: The total purse for the US Open will surpass $60 million for the first time, with singles champions each receiving $2.6 million and a larger part of the total player compensation being allocated to the earlier rounds.
articles.content:
